column4: hey all... I just changed all instances of dapper to edgy in my sources.list then ran an update, then a dist-upgrade... I downloaded about 660mb of stuff, and now there are a few packages it can't find and it won't let me continue with the install
no idea how apt works, so any help would be good... (I'm getting 404 not found)
that method of upgrading really isn't supported...is it?
I have no clue whatsoever, was pointed to it on a link from this channel, and just followed it
